description: As Sam understands it, the element is most useful for situations like this one with a PNG image as fallback for SVG. When we're just changing between different versions of the same image, with srcset and sizes attributes seems to be recommended to use. But just for fun, can you help Sam convert the header image to a element instead?
todo: Create a element that works exactly like the following . Use two tags, one for medium and one for large. Add "media" attributes for the media queries. The small image should be the fallback.

correct.headline: You're the best!
correct.text: Nothing has changed, and that's a good thing! With your help, Sam has learned very much about the <picture> element.

wrong.headline: Don't give up!
wrong.text: That's not how it should be done, but Sam needs your help with this one so give it another try!
